name: FluidNinja LIVE 1.7 Demo
description:
Runtime precompiled demo for FluidNinja LIVE 1.7

Released: 2022-07-01 Copyright: Greg Resler and Andras Ketzer License: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 Made with: Unreal Engine 4.26

Live is a fast, responsive fluidsim for character and environment VFX

LIVE 1.7 FEATURES

  • improved world-space motion: local solver moves in large discrete steps
  • driving other systems directly: landscape materials, volumes, particles
  • driving multiple systems with a single fluidsim
  • local solver combined with global pattern generator to cover infinite fields
  • simple-mode: track objects and draw trajectories in world-space, without running fluidsim (eg. footsteps)
  • modularity: add other systems as Component to Ninja / add Ninja as Component to other Actors
  • niagara 2-way data flow: drive particles with sim / drive sim with particles
